name: Seasons LoRA [72MB]
description:
This is a Season based LoRA, bringing the vibrancies and the traits that come with the seasons (In some cases including the clothing style)

Trained on Anything 4.0, but can work on any model.

You could prompt for each of these seasons independently without this LoRA with the characteristic traits and colours, but this will send it to another level, even without needing to prompt the traits.

All you need is to mention Summer, Winter, Autumn, or Spring in your prompt.

Can work with Environments, and can work with characters.

Enjoy

P.S - Spring wont always have cherry blossoms because they arent everywhere, if you want them its as easy as specifying flower or blossoms.

modelVersions.name: v1 Epoch 4
modelVersions.description: 20 Images per season = 80 images, 50 Repeats per image, 4 Epoch.
